For models with a grid, the user has a choice of exporting the outline of the grid, the outline of the active cells in the grid, or the outlines of both the active and inactive cells in the grid. For the purposes of exporting the outline of the model, if any cell in a vertical column of cells is active, that cell will be considered active when exporting the model outline. The outline will be from the top view of the model except for 2D SUTRA profile models in which the outline will be a profile view of the model. The area of each shape will be included as an attribute of the shape. For active and inactive cells, the active or inactive status will be included as an attribute of the shapes.
